description: This file initializes a vector database with PDF URLs and metadata, sets up a knowledge base, and performs a filtered query using an agent, demonstrating document filtering and querying in a knowledge management system.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: Class representing the LanceDB vector database, used for storing and querying vector data.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Class representing a knowledge base initialized with PDF URLs and associated metadata.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base, capable of performing filtered queries.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Method to load documents into the knowledge base, with an option to recreate the database.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output the response from the agent based on a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
